Title: OB_TRANSACTION_ID
Description: 当前会话处于活跃事务中，则返回所处的事务 ID 整数值，大于 0。
当前会话如果未处于活跃事务中，返回 0。
Examples:
obclient [SYS]> START TRANSACTION;
obclient [SYS]> SELECT OB_TRANSACTION_ID() FROM DUAL;
+---------------------+
| OB_TRANSACTION_ID() |
+---------------------+
|            11003721 |
+---------------------+
1 row in set
obclient [SYS]> COMMIT;
obclient [SYS]> SELECT OB_TRANSACTION_ID() FROM DUAL;
+---------------------+
| OB_TRANSACTION_ID() |
+---------------------+
|                   0 |
+---------------------+
1 row in set
